heading: Urban folklore.
alt-heading: Cities and towns (in religion, folklore, etc.).
general-note: Here are entered general works on folklore in urban areas. This heading may be divided geographically by names of individual regions, countries, states, etc. Works on folklore in specific cities or other urban areas are entered under the heading. Folklore. with the appropriate geographic subdivision. Works on cities and towns as a theme in folklore are entered under. Cities and towns--Folklore..
